set.name: CustomActionsXml
set.value: <menu><item title="Set in Progress" image="clock_history_frame.png" command="WORKFLOW" value="Incident_ChangeStatus" attributes="id,IncidentStatusId=5,Form=Incident_SetInProgress" pos="out" width="450" height="500" full="" showoutlabel="true"/> <item title="On Hold" image="clock_select_remain.png" command="WORKFLOW" value="Incident_ChangeStatus" attributes="id,IncidentStatusId=10,Form=Incident_OnHold" pos="out" width="450" height="500" full="false" showoutlabel="true"/> <item title="Cancelled" image="brick_delete.png" command="WORKFLOW" value="Incident_ChangeStatus" attributes="id,IncidentStatusId=8,Form=Incident_Cancelled" pos="out" width="450" height="500" full="false" showoutlabel="true"/> <item title="Ready for Testing" image="brick_error.png" command="WORKFLOW" value="Incident_ChangeStatus" attributes="id,IncidentStatusId=6,Form=Incident_ReadyForTesting" pos="out" width="450" height="500" full="false" showoutlabel="true"/> <item title="Mark as Resolved" image="brick_go.png" command="WORKFLOW" value="Incident_ChangeStatus" attributes="id,IncidentStatusId=7,Form=Incident_Accepted" pos="out" width="450" height="500" full="false" showoutlabel="true"/> <item title="Send Question" image="email_go.png" command="WORKFLOW" value="Incident_Reply" attributes="id" pos="out" width="900" height="550" full="false" showoutlabel="true"/> <item/> <item title="Report" image="16_print.png" command="URL" value="ASP.Net/FM/DataViewer/Print/DocumentReportDownloader.aspx" attributes="t=[t],viewName=[v],template=ReportWithImages" pos="out" width="500" height="240" full="false" showoutlabel="true"/> </menu>

set.name: tbMoreActions.Text
set.value: <menu><item title="Report Bug" image="ASP.Net/FM/Common/Images/ico/Create.gif" command="WORKFLOW" window="NEW" scroll="false" full="false" pos="out" showoutlabel="true" width="720" height="500" value="Incident_Open"/><item title="Set in Progress" image="ASP.Net/FM/Common/Images/ico/RecordsApprove.gif" command="WORKFLOW" scroll="false" pos="out" full="false" window="NEW" width="450" height="460" showoutlabel="true" value="Incident_ChangeStatus" attributes="id,_data=IncidentStatusId:5,_data=Form:Incident_SetInProgress"/><item title="Resolve" image="ASP.Net/FM/Common/Images/ico/Outbox.gif" command="WORKFLOW" window="NEW" scroll="false" full="false" value="Incident_ChangeStatus" attributes="id,_data=IncidentStatusId:7,_data=Form:Incident_Accepted" width="450" height="460" pos="out" showoutlabel="true"/><item title="On Hold" image="ASP.Net/FM/Common/Images/ico/Records.gif" command="WORKFLOW" scroll="false" pos="out" attributes="id,_data=IncidentStatusId:10,_data=Form:Incident_OnHold" full="false" window="NEW" value="Incident_ChangeStatus" showoutlabel="true" width="450" height="460"/><item title="Cancelled" image="ASP.Net/FM/Common/Images/ico/ClaimRejected.gif" command="WORKFLOW" scroll="false" pos="out" attributes="id,_data=IncidentStatusId:8,_data=Form:Incident_Cancelled" full="false" window="NEW" value="Incident_ChangeStatus" width="450" height="460" showoutlabel="true"/><item title="Send Question" image="ASP.Net/FM/Common/Images/ico/Contacts.gif" command="WORKFLOW" window="NEW" scroll="false" full="false" value="Incident_Reply" attributes="id" pos="out" showoutlabel="true" width="800" height="600"/><splitter/></menu>
